trends: There has been one other sighting in University Place
There were no other sightings in University Place on or around July 29th 2010
Summary: Light flying and flashes and then flies up out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and myself were out on the patio smoking when I looked up and noticed a light flying. I have seen some strange things before in the skies. This was really different. It was as if it was flying downward and when it got closer to breaking into our atmosphere. It started to get brighter and larger as if it was heading down in our direction. Then it flashed and flew upwards until it flew out of sight in an slanted upwards direction.
